data.event: Batavia was surveyed on May 28, 1788, by Captain Francis Minnis, John O'Bannon, Nicholas Keller, Archelus Price, and John Ormsley.

event.title: became the area's first settler in the fall of 1797

data.event: Virginian Ezekiel Dimmitt became the area's first settler in the fall of 1797.
George Ely purchased the Minnis survey in 1807 and platted the town on October 24, 1814, possibly naming it after Batavia, New York.
